contentfulProduct.seoDescription: A hypoallergenic alternative with the support and loft of luxury down. Wake up feeling fully rested. Available in two densities for whatever your best night of sleep requires.
contentfulProduct.title: Premium Down Alternative Pillow

content.value: A hypoallergenic alternative with the support and loft of luxury down. Wake up feeling fully rested. Available in two densities for whatever your best night of sleep requires.
Hypoallergenic microfiber fill
100% cotton sateen shell
Mimics the comfort of classic down for the allergy prone, offering comparable support and loft
Made in the USA of imported materials
Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle. Use mild detergents only. Tumble dry on lowest heat setting until completely dry. Option to professionally dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Hypoallergenic microfiber fill
  • 100% cotton sateen shell
  • Mimics the comfort of classic down for the allergy prone, offering comparable support and loft
  • Made in the USA of imported materials
